rice_blast.name: Blas Fare
rice_blast.description: Blas ake panyeki jamur nggori ganas ma karna kade Pyricularia oryzae. Panyeki ake nyarama lembu we'i pembibitan sambe panen. Panyeki ake sangat merugian lequ daerah lek kelembaban tinggi.
rice_blast.symptoms: Bercana belah ketupat, leher malai patah

rice_brown_spot.name: Bercana Coklat Fare
rice_brown_spot.description: Gejalana berupa bercana oval warna coklat lek titik tengana abu-abu atau mputi lequ dauna.

rice_bacterial_leaf_blight.name: Hawar Daun (Kresek)
rice_bacterial_leaf_blight.description: Panyeki ake sangat merusak waktu musim ura lek angin kencang. Dauna kuning dari tepi.

corn_downy_mildew.name: Bulai Jago
corn_downy_mildew.description: Ancaman utama petani jago. Daun mputi kekuningan, tanama kerdil.

corn_leaf_blight.name: Hawar Daun Jago
corn_leaf_blight.description: Bercana panjang warna abu-abu lequ dauna.

chili_anthracnose.name: Antraknosa Saha
chili_anthracnose.description: Panyeki paling merusak lequ bua saha. Bua busuk warna item.

chili_bacterial_wilt.name: Layu Bakteri
chili_bacterial_wilt.description: Saha layu tiba-tiba padahal dauna masi hijau.

chili_yellow_leaf_curl.name: Virus Kuning
chili_yellow_leaf_curl.description: Daun saha keriting warna kuning. Tanama kerdil.

onion_purple_blotch.name: Bercana Ungu Bawang
onion_purple_blotch.description: Ada bercana ungu lequ daun bawang, daun patah.

onion_fusarium_basal_rot.name: Moler
onion_fusarium_basal_rot.description: Daun bawang melintir kuning, umbi busuk.

soybean_rust.name: Karat Kedelai
soybean_rust.description: Daun kedelai ada bintik merah coklat.
